content.rendered:
Welcome to the Dean’s List: your weekly destination for Deborah Berke’s most on-topic, off the beaten path rankings.

Penthouse: Bread and Butter
7th Floor: Dill and Hot (tie)
6th Floor: Pickled Beets
5th Floor: Half Sour
4th Floor: Gherkin
Basement: Sweet
Sub-basement: Mango Pickles

Comments: “I really like pickles—especially Bubbie’s Bread&Butter”
